title: extract_filepaths_for_granule Lambda Config
description: The config for the extract_filepaths_for_granule Lambda function.

glacier-bucket.description: The name of the glacier S3 bucket from which files will be restored.

protected-bucket.description: The name of the protected S3 bucket.

internal-bucket.description: The name of the internal S3 bucket.

private-bucket.description: The name of the private  S3 bucket.

public-bucket.description: The name of the public S3 bucket that is visible to users

file-buckets.description: The list of dictionary that contains details of the bucket and regex.

regex.description: The regex that matches the file extension type

sampleFileName.description: name of a sample file having extension.

bucket.description: The name of the S3 bucket where the file is stored.
